title: 10 Tips For Staying Motivated To Eat Healthy
summary: Many people try to change their diet, their exercise routine, and other aspects of their life all at once. Instead of trying to change everything at once, focus on forming one new healthy habit that will assist you in your journey towards better health. Small changes can add up over time, and will help you stay motivated to continue improving your overall health. Eating healthy doesn’t have to be boring or tasteless, it’s important to remember that you’ll always feel guilty or ashamed eating healthy.
